revision.text:
__NOTOC__{{codepointer|Sound}} void '''A_StopAllSounds''' ()
==Usage== Stops all the sounds that are playing by the calling actor. This function is the equivalent of using {{c|[[A_StopSounds]]}} while passing 0 to both parameters.
==Examples== {{noexamples}} ==See also== *[[A_StartSound]] *[[A_StopSound]]
